scripts.build.azure: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/azure-swa/vite.config.ts && touch dist/index.html && rm dist/app/index.html
scripts.build.cloudflare: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/cloudflare-pages/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.deno: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/deno/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.express: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/express/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.fastify: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/fastify/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.netlify: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/netlify-edge/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.preview: npm run build.client && vite build --minify=false --ssr custom-src/entry.preview.tsx
scripts.build.static: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/static/vite.config.ts
scripts.build.vercel: npm run build.client && vite build -c adapters/vercel-edge/vite.config.ts
scripts.test.azure.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.azure.config.ts
scripts.test.azure.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.azure.config.ts
scripts.test.cloudflare.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.cloudflare.config.ts
scripts.test.cloudflare.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.cloudflare.config.ts
scripts.test.dev.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.config.ts
scripts.test.dev.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.config.ts
scripts.test.deno.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.deno.config.ts
scripts.test.deno.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.deno.config.ts
scripts.test.express.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.express.config.ts
scripts.test.express.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.express.config.ts
scripts.test.fastify.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.fastify.config.ts
scripts.test.fastify.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.fastify.config.ts
scripts.test.netlify.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.netlify.config.ts
scripts.test.netlify.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.netlify.config.ts
scripts.test.preview.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.preview.config.ts
scripts.test.preview.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.preview.config.ts
scripts.test.static.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests/static.spec.ts --config playwright.static.config.ts
scripts.test.static.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests/static.spec.ts --config playwright.static.config.ts
scripts.test.vercel.mpa: cross-env APP=mpa playwright test tests --config playwright.vercel.config.ts
scripts.test.vercel.spa: cross-env APP=spa playwright test tests --config playwright.vercel.config.ts
